title: Gazpacho shots with pimenton and caraway seed twists
description: The weather needs to be sizzling hot to really enjoy an ice cold glass of gazpacho. This recipe makes savoury pastry twists to set off its punchy flavour.
ingredients: 1 small bunch spring onions, trimmed and chopped
3 tbsp white balsamic vinegar, plus extra to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 small bunch fresh chives, finely chopped
